OUR MISSION

ACCESSIBLE

No technical background required. We use plain language and real examples everyone can understand.

COMMUNITY-CENTERED

Led by Newark residents, for Newark residents. Local voices shape our content and events.

PRACTICAL

Learn skills you can use today. From parenting tips to job search strategies with AI tools.
